title: [K-12] Advanced Science Instructional Design Course Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen data-driven instructional design competencies using digital devices

learning_goals: Explain at least three science instruction design frameworks based on learning theories (constructivism, behaviorism, etc.)
Collect and analyze class activity data using learning analytics tools to propose teaching improvement strategies
Establish personalized feedback strategies reflecting formative assessment results in large lecture settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
